props.length: The length of the pagination component
props.nextIcon: Specify the icon to use for the next icon
props.prevIcon: Specify the icon to use for the prev icon
props.totalVisible: Specify the max total visible pagination numbers
props.mobileBreakpoint: Specify the breakpoint at which the mini variant should be applied, default is 600px

events.onNext: Emitted when going to next item
events.onPrevious: Emitted when going to previous item
events.miniVariantChanged: Emitted when the mini variant changes
